Banner.Description: I am a passionate engineering student from Morocco with a strong foundation in developing systems and other technological solutions. I focus on writing clean, reusable, and scalable code in Java, Python, and JavaScript, while also exploring data science and machine learning using tools like TensorFlow, Pandas, and Scikit-learn.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a student, I have been actively learning and working on projects that span web and mobile development, as well as data analysis and machine learning. I am eager to contribute my skills to create solutions that solve real-world problems.
I have worked on various personal and academic projects, implementing system improvements, optimizing websites, and experimenting with predictive models and data visualization.
I enjoy programming in my free time, exploring new technologies, and honing my skills through hands-on experience.
Some of the technologies I have worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Data Scientist and Software Intern
Description: Designed and developed highly interactive Power BI dashboards to provide insightful data visualizations, improving decision-making workflows.
Built advanced revenue forecasting models using machine learning and deep learning techniques, significantly enhancing the accuracy of financial predictions.
Developed a web-based intranet application to optimize document management across multiple departments, improving accessibility and fostering cross-departmental collaboration.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Mobile App Developer Intern
Description: Designed and implemented intuitive mobile interfaces to enhance user experience.
Developed robust backend services and relational databases to ensure seamless application functionality and data integrity.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Data Scientist and Software Intern
Description: Created a desktop demo application to manage client subscription.
Developed a facial recognition system for authenticating clients using their national ID and actual photo significantly enhancing security and client verification processes.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web Developer Intern
Description: Developed a dynamic sales management website.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Intranet Docs Manager
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A platform that aims to facilitate the sharing, tracking, and management of documents within an organization. The application allows users to upload, share, and admins to track document activity across departments. Integrated Chart.js for real-time graphs and visualizations, providing insights into document interactions, views, and usage trends.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Revenue analysis & forecast
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed machine learning models using ARIMA, XGBoost, and LSTM to predict revenue trends. Integrated TensorFlow and Scikit-learn for model training, and implemented an automated email notification.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Instagram Clone
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a mobile app using Flutter with intuitive UI/UX elements similar to Instagram. Built a fully functional backend with Express and MySQL to support core features such as user authentication, image upload, and social interactions.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Some Games I made
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A glimpse into my mini game development mini-journey. These snapshots capture the fun and passion I poured while making these projects. Also adding that I made all the 3d assets in those gamesðŸ˜€.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Digital HR
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Created a user-friendly HR platform, with features to rank resumes based on desired skills. Integrated RAG to leverage large language models (LLMs) for extracting valuable information from uploaded documents.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: ZFT-COMPRESSER
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A Java-based console application for compressing and decompressing folders using a custom .zft format. It also includes optional password protection for compressed files.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: N7FLIX
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A film recommendation desktop application with a simple content-based filtering algorithm to suggest movies based on user preferences.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Madinaty-App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: This user-friendly mobile app aims to flag deficiencies in infrastructure and allow users to report issues in a manageable, digitalized way.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Chess Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A two-player chess game with realistic wood textures and sound effects for an immersive experience.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
